post:
Hello LET :)

We just launched a OVHcloud / So you Start Deals (ye, a new one once again)

Till 9th June
https://www.ovh.ie/deals/
https://www.ovh.com/world/deals/

Dedicated servers

**OVH offers**

Special edition server (= recurring pricing).
**No setup fees**

https://www.ovh.ie/dedicated_servers/rise/prices/
https://www.ovh.com/world/dedicated-servers/rise/prices/

**Rise-LE-1**

Intel Xeon E5-1660v3 - 8 c/16 t
3 GHz/3,5 GHz
64 GB DDR4 ECC 2133 MHz
2 x 4 TB HDD SATA Soft RAID
500 Mbps BW
**59.99€ excl-VAT**

Available in FR / CA datacenters

**Advance-LE**

Intel Xeon W-2145 - 8 c/16 t
3,7 GHz/4,5 GHz
128 GB DDR4 ECC 2133 MHz
2 x 960 GB SSD NVMe Soft RAID
1 Gbps BW
**114.99€ excl-VAT**

Available in FR / UK / DE datacenters
